item.title: PASSENGER SEATS – ARMREST WITHOUT RECLINE MECHANISM

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing and seat occupied provided:

numlitem.para: Armrest does not block an Emergency Exit, and
Armrest does not restrict any passenger from access to the main aircraft aisle.

placard.para: Placard affected seat: "SEAT ARMREST INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
